title: Melt Style Floor Lamp
body: Get inspred by Tom Dixon, this Melt Style Floor Lamp is a unique modern ceiling light, completes with a high-transparent coloured polycarbonate dome to give your room a more romantic and beautiful ambience. Obsessed with the idea of creating an imperfect, organic and naturalistic lighting object, The shade of the floor lamp is made of polycarbonate.With the light on, you'll be mesmerised by a hypnotic play of light that astonishes the beholder.
